title: Jessy Pouliot
subtitle: Senior Software Engineer
presentation: Experienced developer with a strong background in ReactJS and Typescript. Proven track record in collaborating with UI/UX teams to ensure technical feasibility and optimize applications for performance and scalability. Skilled in API integration and mobile development, with a history of leading projects and winning hackathons.

content.text: We reduced our time to update copy from 2 weeks to a couple seconds by implementing a CMS combined with a JSON cache on a CDN for the fastest response time.
Learned web development from front end to back using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, PHP and Laravel.
Learned game development with Unity3D and C#

list.details: I can easily come up with clever solutions to complex problems and I can easily freestyle quality user interfaces.
I want to understand everything and learn every quirks of the tools I use in order to make the best decisions every time.
Even when things aren't working out, I always figure it out.

content.text: Building complex user interfaces such as:

list.text: Configurable grid layouts for rendering multiple camera live streams, videos or anything else.
Drag & drop user experience that allowed for the easiest and effortless user experience when configuring the above mentioned grid layouts.
Infinitely scrollable timeline build to select the time for a stream of cameras.

content.text: Writing performant SQL queries with permissions, keyset pagination (infinite paging) and more.
Lead the mobile development by building a component library and being a key help resource for anything related to react-native
Built a video integration feature for our email communication editor in both our website and mobile app to allow for a more personal communication method during COVID travel restrictions.
Joined the react-native team to learn the technology and quickly grew to become the mobile team lead after fixed many issues with the app's codebase at the time.
